Putar Otak Bayar Utang, Bulog Mau Jualan Dedak
01 Nov 2019, 12:05 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Direktur Utama Perum Bulog Budi Waseso (Buwas) menceritakan kisah 'berdarah-darahnya' perusahaan pelat merah tersebut dalam menjaga keberlangsungan perusahaan.Bulog harus menyerap beras lokal produksi petani dan juga melakukan impor beras untuk memenuhi memenuhi penugasan Cadangan Beras Pemerintah (CBP). Bulog sampai harus berutang untuk membiayai pegasan tersebut.Akibat utang tersebut, bahkan Bulog harus menanggung bunga utang sebesar Rp 10 miliar/hari. Belum cukup beban membayar utang dan bunga utang, Bulog juga harus memenuhi kebutuhan operasional Rp 6 miliar/hari."Kita dapat penugasan dari negara untuk impor beras contohnya, ini kan beras CBP, tapi yang mengimpor dan membeli Bulog, uangnya pinjam, utangnya Bulog," ungkap Buwas dalam acara Ngopi BUMN, di kantor Kementerian BUMN, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Sayangnya, penjualan beras Bulog seret karena tak terserap pasar. Sehingga pendapatan perusahan pun tersendat dan terancam tak bisa bayar utang.Buwas pun putar otak untuk mengatasi seretnya penjualan beras tersebutn dengan melakukan sejumlah inovasi salah satunya adalah menjual beras premium."Untuk komersial juga harus bicara kualitas. Tidak bisa hanya kuantitas dan berharap pada masyarakat. Tidak bisa, harus kita yang bergerak. Maka saya membuat program. Dan saya membuat produk beras premium dari beberapa jenis beras berkualitas termasuk kemasannya, mereknya. Nah terbangun inovasi-inovasi di kalangan anggota saya," tutur Buwas.Inovasi lain yang dilakukan Bulog adalah mengembangkan produk beras fortivikasi atau beras bervitamin. Selain itu, Bulog juga membuat tepung dari bahan baku bekatul yakni bulir beras, atau yang biasa dikenal dengan dedak."Ternyata ada poduk kualitas yang dihasilkan dari beras, yaitu bekatul atau dedak. Itu dulu untuk pakan ayam dan ikan. Tapi orang asing yang mengerti kualitas pangan mereka mengkonsumsi itu dedek. Lihat saja di Ranch Market harga bekatul itu mahal. Timbul pemikiran saya kita memproduksi beras kok itu kita abaikan, padahal punya nilai ekonomis dan jelas nilai vitamin yang tinggi karena itu ada di kulit ari-nya beras. Akhirnya saya bilang Direksi coba pikir ini akan jadi produk kita. Tapi tidak baku, bagaimana kaau kita bikin jadi tepung, bahan dasar kue pengganti terigu," urainya.(dna/dna)

Play Brain Paying Debt, Bulog Wants to Sell Bran
01 Nov 2019, 12:05 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Bulog President Director Budi Waseso (Buwas) tells the 'bloody' story of the state-owned company in maintaining the sustainability of the company. Bulog must absorb local rice produced by farmers and also import rice to fulfill the Government Rice Reserve (CBP) assignment. Bulog has to borrow to finance the assertion. As a result of the debt, even Bulog has to bear debt interest of Rp 10 billion / day. Not enough burden to pay debt and debt interest, Bulog also has to meet operational needs of Rp 6 billion / day. "We can get assignments from the state to import rice, for example, this is CBP rice, but those who import and buy Bulog, borrow money, borrow Bulog, "said Buwas in the BUMN Coffee Event, at the SOE Ministry office, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). Unfortunately, Bulog rice sales were dragging down because they were not absorbed by the market. So that the company's revenue was stalled and threatened not to be able to pay debts. Indulgence also racked the brain to overcome the sluggish sales of rice by carrying out a number of innovations, one of which was selling premium rice. "We can't do it, we have to move. So I made a program. And I made premium rice products from several types of quality rice including the packaging, the brand. Now innovations have been built up among my members," said Buwas. Another innovation made by Bulog was developing fortified rice products or vitamin-rich rice. In addition, Bulog also makes flour from rice bran raw material, which is rice bran, or commonly known as bran. "Apparently there are quality products produced from rice, which is rice bran or bran. That used to feed chicken and fish. But foreigners who understand the quality of the food they consume is deductive, just look at the Ranch Market the price of rice bran is expensive, my thought arises that we produce rice, why do we ignore it, even though it has economic value and obviously a high vitamin value because it is in the epidermis of rice. "The Board of Directors thought that this would be our product. But it is not standard, how do you make it into flour, the basic ingredient of flour substitute cake," he explained. (dna / dna)
